Database Classes¶

class src.main.python.flaskserv.Database.DBAccessory[source]¶

Bases: type

Metaclass for the Database classes MusicDB and UserDB. Will wrap all non-special functions with a decorator, providing a scoped instance of DBInstance.

classmethod deco(func)[source]¶

Decorator which calls function with scoped DBInstance in the class dict

Parameters:func (function reference) – function to decorate
class src.main.python.flaskserv.Database.DBInstance(handle)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides a specified wrapper for sqlite3 queries

Parameters:handle (str) – location of sqlite database (can be :memory:)
create_table(table_name, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a new table in the database. If ‘UNIQUE:col_name’ present in **kwargs, adds a CONSTRAINT to the table called unique_col, making col_name unique.

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table
  • **kwargs (dict) – keys are columns, values are datatypes
delete_rows(table_name, condition)[source]¶

delete rows from a table in database if condition is met

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table
  • condition (dict) – the condition to be met to qualify for removal
get_column_info(table_name)[source]¶

method for getting the column info of a table

Parameters:table_name (str) – name of the table to get the column names of
Returns:list of column names
insert_entire_row(table_name, data)[source]¶

insert a row of values into a given table

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table
  • data (list) – items are data values
Raises:

Exception(“Bad row format.”)
select_columns(table_name, column_list)[source]¶

select whole column from table

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table
  • column (str/list[str]) – name of column to select from
Returns:

list of tuples with items from column [(x1, y1, …), (x2, y2, …), …]
select_rows(table_name, condition)[source]¶

select rows from table which meat condition

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of table
  • condition (dict) – the condition to be met to qualify for selection
update_generic(table_name, changes, condition)[source]¶

update entries according to condition in the database

Parameters:
  • table_name (str) – name of the table to update
  • changes (dict) – changes to enact e.g. {col1:value1, …}
  • condition (dict) – the condition to be met to qualify for changes e.g. {col3:value3}

class src.main.python.flaskserv.Database.MusicDB(db_handle)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides methods for interacting with the music database. Encapsulates DBInstance

Assumes database already has a table with format

songs

name, artist, duration, path, meta_dat

Parameters:db_handle (str) – sqlite database handle

Bases: object

Provides methods for interacting with the static user database. Encapsulates DBInstance

Assumes database already has a table with format

users

id, name, hash_pw, meta_dat
